thread.title: LeBron James posts pic of Charles Oakley after fiasco at Garden
thread.title_full: LeBron James posts pic of Charles Oakley after fiasco at Garden

author: JOHN HEALY
title: LeBron James posts pic of Charles Oakley after fiasco at Garden
text:
LeBron James posts pic of Charles Oakley after incident at Knicks game LeBron James posts pic of Charles Oakley after fiasco at Garden LeBron James sides with Charles Oakley in his dispute with the Knicks. (Steve Dykes/AP) Thursday, February 9, 2017, 12:16 AM 
Count LeBron James in as having Charles Oakley’s back. 
Following Wednesday’s incident at the Knicks game against the Clippers in which Oakley was arrested, James posted a picture of the former Knicks star on Instagram with the caption “Mood!! #Legend” 
Oakley assaulted multiple security guards after he was confronted about sitting behind owner James Dolan. Oakley refused to comply with security and he was arrested inside the arena. 
James’ Instagram post may be more of a sign of support for his friend Carmelo Anthony.
